location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Map to Show the Limits of Koweit and Adjacent Country'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed in colour on paperDimensions: 395 x 330mm, on sheet 480 x 370mm

mods.abstract: The map shows the limits of Koweit [Kuwait] and adjacent region. Two alternative boundaries appear to have been drawn in red crayon and black ink. The map also gives indication of relief, hydrology and settlements. The scale is given as 1 inch = 48 miles.The map bears the following printing statement 'Harrison and Sons, Lith, St Martins Lane, W.C.'
